summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2004 TOYOTA CAMRY.  THE CONTACT NOTICED THAT THE DRIVER SIDE AIR BAG LIGHT WAS ILLUMINATED.  THE DEALER STATED THAT THE SPIRAL CABLE NEEDED TO BE REPLACED AND WOULD COST $1,321.  THE PURCHASE DATE AND POWERTRAIN WERE UNKNOWN.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 61,087 AND FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 58,000.    UPDATED 04-02-08 *BF
